subject: World Cup (Skiing)
Alpine Skiing
lead_paragraph: Stacey Cook won her second title in two days by edging out the World Cup overall champion Lindsey Vonn, and T. J. Lanning beat Andrew Weibrecht for the men’s crown at the United States Alpine Championships in Carrabassett Valley, Me. Cook beat Vonn for the second day in a row, having won the super-G title Sunday. Lanning’s victory was his first national title after injuries forced him to miss all or parts of the past four seasons.
